episode.title: They Buy a Hole in the Wall
episode.rawTitle: 125: ‘They Buy a Hole in the Wall’ With Guest Horace Dediu
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special guest Horace Dediu joins The Talk Show for the first time. Topics include the state of the maps industry, Apple's functional organizational structure, what the WWDC keynote said about the state of the company today, and more.
episode.showNotes:
Special guest Horace Dediu joins The Talk Show for the first time. Topics include the state of the maps industry, Apple’s functional organizational structure, what the WWDC keynote said about the state of the company today, and more.
